```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# packages

library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(plotly)
library(DT)
```

Scatter plot of penguin flipper_length_mm (x-axis) vs body_mass_g (y-axis), with points having different colors based on species
```{r}
penguins_graph <- ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = flipper_length_mm, y = body_mass_g)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = species))

ggplotly(penguins_graph)
```

```{r}
datatable(penguins)
```
